= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *BFA.FT.ACC* || Nucleus Accumbens || Activate motor functions under attention || ||
|| *BFA.FT.AM* || Amygdala || Experiencing and recognizing emotions || ||
|| *BFA.FT.NBM* || Basal Nucleus of Meynert || Control imagination vs perception || ACh source, attention ||
|| *BFA.FT.BNST* || Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis || Mediate slow longer-lasting responses that accompany sustained threats || Major output from AM to HT ||
|| *BFA.FT.SEP* || Septal Nuclei || Inhibition of fear and expression of pleasurable responses || ||
|| *BFA.FT.EPF* || Endopiriform Nucleus || Putative relay of limbic-associated cortical-like areas subserving affective information || ||
